channel.title: Traffic Noise on Michael Mommert
channel.description: Recent content in Traffic Noise on Michael Mommert

item.title: Traffic Noise Estimation from Satellite Imagery with Deep Learning
item.description: Road traffic noise is a global issue that can lead to severe health effects. Despite the ubiquity of traffic noise, its quantification or estimation is complicated and detailed road traffic maps are only available for select countries or areas. We investigate whether it is possible to train a segmentation model to esimate road traffic noise from satellite imagery.
